#include<stdio.h>


int main()
{
    long long test_case,n;
    scanf("%lld",&test_case);
    while(test_case--)
    {  
       int count=0;
       scanf("%lld",&n);
       if((n&(n-1))==0) count++;
       if(count) printf("No\n");
       else printf("Yes\n");
       }
      
       return 0;
       }
